ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greeting to all
ygData.msgSnippet: Tribunal Server..........and you? What is your character lvl? I hit 17 last night, my first character, i love it!!! Melefante (Ranger/Woodelf/Knights of
ygData.messageBody:
Tribunal Server..........and you?
What is your character lvl?
I hit 17 last night, my first character, i love it!!!
Melefante (Ranger/Woodelf/Knights of Shadowfall/Tribunal)
PsyKo <sibilant_ghost@...> wrote:Actually, it would be possible to set up a "BAR" in
the bazaar I suppose. Thanks for the idea =P what
server are you on anyway?



--- Meleficent Ouverts <meleficent22@...> wrote:
>
> /reaches over and pokes psyko in the eye
>
> /tells psyko she is sorry, then does it
> again...giggles
> Okay okay, i am still new to this stuff to, lemme
> alone Psyko! :)
> Don't make me come back over there!!! LOL :) *smile*
> Melefante
>
>
> PsyKo wrote:/cackle Melefante
> /point Melefante
> /laugh Melefante
>
> Bar as in barbarian, unless, that is, you we being
> facetious... =P
>
>
> --- Meleficent Ouverts <meleficent22@...>
> wrote:
> >
> > you are running a bar Ralph? How did you do that?
> I
> > am very interested in this.
> > thanks
> > Melefante 16/ranger/tribunal server
> > "(Ralph) Clay" wrote:I am a little new to
> Everquest
> > but I love the game. I am , right now
> > running a Shaman Bar. 11th level by the name of
> > Fireefrost on the Xev
> > server. RIght now I am trying to rid the world of
> > Sick Bear and Wolf
> > ( and getting the PP and exp's for turning in the
> > belts). I am slowly
> > riseing in levels but enjoying every sec. of it .
> > hope to talk to you
> > all later.
> >
> > Fireefrost
> > Healer for the lands of Ice
